Thinking in Systems (Meadows, Donella H.)
- Your Highlight on page 22 | Location 492-493 | Added on Saturday, July 16, 2022 9:50:38 AM

Everyone understands that you can prolong the life of an oil-based economy by discovering new oil deposits. It seems to be harder to understand that the same result can be achieved by burning less oil.
==========
﻿Egghead (Burnham, Bo)
- Your Highlight on page 140 | Location 707-707 | Added on Sunday, July 17, 2022 7:16:19 AM

I wanted something this morning. I may be stuck. But at least I’m three feet closer to it.
==========
﻿How to Do Nothing (Odell, Jenny)
- Your Highlight on page ix | Location 46-47 | Added on Sunday, July 17, 2022 7:18:10 AM

We submit our free time to numerical evaluation, interact with algorithmic versions of each other, and build and maintain personal brands.
==========
﻿Indistractable (Eyal, Nir)
- Your Highlight on page 83 | Location 1189-1191 | Added on Wednesday, August 10, 2022 7:59:22 AM

The Fogg Behavior Model states that for a behavior (B) to occur, three things must be present at the same time: motivation (M), ability (A), and a trigger (T). More succinctly, B = MAT.
==========
﻿Indistractable (Eyal, Nir)
- Your Highlight on page 94 | Location 2001-2002 | Added on Wednesday, August 10, 2022 7:59:22 AM

Expected highlight that is already in dynamodb
